de.engehausen.treemap.impl

Class RectangleModelImpl<N>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.engehausen.treemap.impl.RectangleModelImpl<N>
  • Type Parameters:
    N - the type of node the rectangles use.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITreeModel<IRectangle<N>>

    public class RectangleModelImpl<N>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITreeModel<IRectangle<N>>
    An implementation of a tree model holding rectangles.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RectangleModelImpl()
      Creates an empty rectangle model.
      RectangleModelImpl(IRectangle<N> root)
      Creates a rectangle model with one node (the root node).
